name: Mustache Bash
description:
Another Game Jam game. This time you need to get to your grandmother's for Easter dinner as a buff guy with a mustache.

Music:

My Mentor: Class of 3000

Magnus's Theme: Kid Icarus Uprising

Wild Outlaw: Fire Emblem Fates

Milky Way Wishes: Kirby Super Star

SFX:

Voice: [Heavy voice clips: Team Fortress 2 (Gary Schwartz)]

Wax: [Heal: Brave Frontier]
